hero.title: MIAGE Student
hero.subtitle: Web & Mobile Developer
hero.description: Passionate about developing modern web and mobile applications. Looking for a PFE internship for 2025 to apply my skills and contribute to innovative projects.

about.title: About
about.description1: MIAGE Master's student (Computer Methods Applied to Business Management), I combine strong technical development skills with a deep understanding of business challenges.
about.description2: Passionate about web and mobile technologies, I strive to create high-performance, intuitive, and elegant applications. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects that have a real impact.
about.educationDesc: MIAGE Master's - Specialization in application development and project management
about.expertiseDesc: Full-Stack Development with React, Node.js, and modern technologies
about.objectiveDesc: PFE Internship 2025 - Web/Mobile Development in an innovative company
